name: Five Nights At Freddy's First Victim
name_original: Five Nights At Freddy's First Victim
description:
FnaF First Victim, is a fan-made Five Nights at Freddy's game but is heavily based on the Final Fantasy series It's about a kid named Orion who got sent to an orphanage because his mother passed away from heart cancer and got sent to Mrs.Aftons orphanage. He then fell in love with a murderer's daughter named Elizabeth but later became Vanessa.
William Afton murdered Orion when he was 8 years old but after 10 years later his still wandering soul witnessed Mrs.Afton get murdered by William Afton, all of that pain and agony he felt when he was live manifested and somehow turned him into a nightmare animatronic. However he didn't became a normal scary killer animatronic, he still contained forms of other emotions and reason within his mind. He does however hold a mysterious and powerful blade that absorb agony and negative emotions in order to power himself up. He began a self quest to end William Afton evil and madness, with his adopted sister Charlie standing by his side a few friends along the way of his metallic journey.
